repos.description: Has CI workflows, tests + linter config
Large repo (10k+ files) for stress testing

results.output:
usage: firsttry [-h]
                {run,lint,inspect,sync,status,setup,doctor,mirror-ci,version}
                ...

FirstTry — local CI engine (run gates / profiles / reports).

positional arguments:
  {run,lint,inspect,sync,status,setup,doctor,mirror-ci,version}
    run                 Run FirstTry checks on this repo
    lint                Ultra-fast linting with ruff (minimal overhead)
    inspect             Show detected context/profile/plan
    sync                Sync local firsttry.toml with CI files (export CI →
                        config)
    status              Show hooks + last run status
    setup               Detect project and install hooks
    doctor              Diagnose env and dependencies
    mirror-ci           Run the CI-parity pipeline locally (same steps as CI)
    version             Show version

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
